item.title: Error adding new npcdrop system for PI
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Add/make a class with the name of NPCDrops. It must have the appropriate methods in it that NPCHandler requires.
